plugin.name: CleftMUSH_CommCatcher
plugin.purpose: move messages from main window to comm log

alias.name: comm_checker
alias.send: purplewhitePrint("***^._.^*** | CleftMUSH Channel List : ------------------------------- | ***^._.^***") print(" | Tells : ",GetVariable("tells_tab")) print(" | OOC : ",GetVariable("ooc_tab")) print(" | Quote : ",GetVariable("quote_tab")) print(" | GroupTell : ",GetVariable("grouptell_tab")) print(" | Music : ",GetVariable("music_tab")) print(" | Grats : ",GetVariable("grats_tab")) print(" | Says : ",GetVariable("says_tab")) print(" | Info : ",GetVariable("info_tab")) print(" | Discord : ",GetVariable("discord_tab")) print(" | Shout : ",GetVariable("shout_tab")) print(" | Yell : ",GetVariable("yell_tab")) purplewhitePrint("***^._.^*** | --------------------------------------------------------- | ***^._.^***")

muclient.triggers:
<trigger enabled="y" match="* '*'" script="grouptell" omit_from_output="n" sequence="100" >
ColourTell ( "red", "black", "[", "white", "black", "Ferry Info", "red", "black", "]", "white", "black", " The ", "yellow","black", "S.S. ZELBESS", "white", "black", " will arrive in one minute!") gt {R[{WFerry Info{R]{W The {YS.S. ZELBESS {Wwill arrive in one minute! gt {R[{WFerry Info{R]{W The {YS.S. ZELBESS {Whas departed!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- <variable name="tells_tab">1</variable> -- <variable name="ooc_tab">1</variable> -- <variable name="quote_tab">1</variable> -- <variable name="grouptell_tab">1</variable> -- <variable name="music_tab">1</variable> -- <variable name="info_tab">1</variable> -- <variable name="say_tab">1</variable> -- <variable name="grats_tab">1</variable> -- <variable name="discord_tab">1</variable> -- <variable name="shout_tab">1</variable> -- <variable name="yell_tab">1</variable> -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
dofile(GetPluginInfo(GetPluginID(), 20) .. "aardwolf_colors.lua")
